*** Settings ***
Library  Library.py
Library  OperatingSystem
Suite Teardown  Sleep  ${TEARDOWN SLEEP}

*** Variables ***
${TEARDOWN SLEEP} =  0 seconds
${TESTSIGNALFILE} =  test_signal_file.txt

*** Test Case ***
Test
    Create File  %{TEMPDIR}/${TESTSIGNALFILE}
    Swallow exception
    Fail  Should not be executed

Test 2
    Fail  Should not be executed
